question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. baseball bat
B. baseball glove
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The baseball bat and glove are both close to the camera, but the glove is slightly behind the batter and bat, making their depth relationship ambiguous without a depth map.
